bgp.name: BGP Route Table Dump
bgp.cmd4: birdc -r 'show route all for {{TARGET}} primary' | tail -n+3 | fgrep -v -e 'BGP.next_hop: ' -e 'BGP.origin: ' -e 'BGP.local_pref: ' | sed -r 's/ from [0-9\.]+\]/ from 0.0.0.0]/'
bgp.cmd6: birdc6 -r 'show route all for {{TARGET}} primary' | tail -n+3 | | fgrep -v -e 'BGP.next_hop: ' -e 'BGP.origin: ' -e 'BGP.local_pref: ' | sed -r 's/ from [a-f0-9:]+\]/ from ::]/'
